home.at_sparks_desc: we don’t just animate – we ignite stories. We craft visual experiences that bring your ideas to life, frame by frame.
home.2d_desc: Let your brand’s story unfold in bold lines, fluid motion, and striking simplicity. Our 2D animation captures hearts and communicates clearly.
home.3d_desc: Whether you're showcasing a product, building a world, or telling a story, our 3D animation team delivers visuals that feel real – and unforgettable.
home.media_desc: Your vision, shot with precision. We handle every stage of media production to create stunning visuals that tell your story with clarity and style.
home.creative_desc: From brainstorming to execution, our creative team builds solutions that solve real problems and connect with real audiences.
home.our_work_desc: Take a glimpse into our creative world — a curated collection of animations, visuals, and stories we've proudly brought to life. Each project reflects our passion, precision, and unique touch.

header.description: Sparks is where your imaginative ideas take shape. We craft next-level 2D & 3D animations that light up your brand and set it in motion.

footer.description: Sparks is a creative studio that crafts powerful 2D and 3D animations, media content, and storytelling experiences that bring your ideas to life.

form.description: It all starts with a spark. Whether you have a script, a crazy idea, or just a vibe — drop us a message. We’re here to turn your thoughts into visual stories that move, engage, and inspire. Let’s create something unforgettable.
form.your_name_min: Please enter your name (at least 2 characters).
form.company_name_min: Please enter a valid company name (at least 2 characters).

contact_message: Your message has been sent successfully!
